articles.title: Mo Brooks: We Can Collapse Iran Economy Without Boots on the Ground

articles.author: James Delingpole
articles.title: Delingpole: Glacier National Park Removes 'Glaciers Gone by 2020' Signs
articles.description: Visitors of Glacier National Park have noticed that far from disappearing by 2020, some glaciers increased in size, despite "climate change."
articles.content:
Glacier National Park is replacing signs predicting that its glaciers will be “gone by 2020.”
Sharp-eyed visitors have noticed that far from disappearing by 2020, some of them have actually increased in size, and 29 of the glaciers in the Montana park remain… [+3840 chars]

articles.author: Penny Starr and Kristina Wong
articles.title: U.S. Military Leader: Iran Missile Attack Was Intended to ‘Kill Personnel’
articles.description: Gen. Mark Milley said Wednesday that missiles Iran launched at Iraqi bases with U.S. troops stationed there were "intended to kill personnel."
articles.content:
Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff Army Gen. Mark Milley said Wednesday during a briefing that an Iran missile attack on Iraqi bases with U.S. troops stationed there was “intended to kill personnel.”

articles.description: Rep. Pramila Jayapal (D-WA), claimed President Trump "recklessly assassinated" Iran terror chief Qasem Soleimani.
